item.title: Introduction
item.description: Introduction Motivation In the battle against climate change, we need to find ways of minimizing greenhouse gas emissions. The transport sector is contributing greatly to the total emissions, hence finding green ways of transportation is key. Denmark is on of the most biking countries in the world - its a means of transport with no CO2 emission connected to it but lots of health benefits for the rider! Denmark is known for its’ bike culture and the bike infrastructure of Danish cities is copied across the world.
